title: U.S. Women's Labor-Force Participation
description:
Description
The Mroz data frame has 753 rows and 8 columns.
The observations, from the Panel Study of Income Dynamics (PSID),
are married women.
reference:
Mroz, T. A. (1987)
The sensitivity of an empirical model of married women's hours of work to
economic and statistical assumptions. 
Econometrica 55, 765–799.

parameters.k618: number of children 6 to 18 years old.
parameters.k5: number of children 5 years old or younger.
parameters.inc: family income exclusive of wife's income.
parameters.lwg:
log expected wage rate; for women in the labor force, the actual
wage rate; for women not in the labor force, an imputed value based on the
regression of lwg on the other variables.

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
